product_title: California Design Den Natural 100% Cotton Sheets Queen Size Bed Set - Soft 400 Thread Count Sateen, Queen Sheets, Deep Pockets with All Around Elastic for a Snug Fit, Cool & Durable Bedding - White
product_byline: Visit the California Design Den Store
about_product: WINNER GOOD HOUSEKEEPING 2023 BEST BEDDING AWARD!: Wake up refreshed in all seasons with our certified 400-thread count soft, cool & comfortable 100 percent cotton queen white sheets, crafted in a soft sateen weave. As featured in a 2023 Wall Street Journal article, our queen sheet set was referred to as "as soft as sheets 3x the price" - a great value indeed. Experience ultimate comfort with these luxury queen sheets.

PERFECTLY SIZED BED SHEET SET WITH DEEP POCKET: Our 4-piece bedding sheets & pillowcases set includes 1 top sheet, 1 deep pocket fitted sheet with an all-around elastic that fits mattresses 8 to 16 inches deep, and 2 standard/queen size pillowcases that fits both standard and queen pillows. The high-quality elastic of this cotton queen sheet set won't loosen or bunch up, and headside/footside indicators make bed-making a breeze

DURABLE, COLORFAST & EASY CARE: You can machine wash and dry our white bed sheets queen size at a normal setting, and they will come out looking great for years. Our deep pocket cooling sheets are durable, with no linting, wrinkle resistant, and no pilling. These queen bed sheets also do not fade or shrink.

HEALTH BENEFITS: Cotton is naturally breathable and gentle on your skin. According to the National Sleep Foundation, synthetic fabrics like microfiber can disrupt sleep and cause health issues, while 100% cotton sheets promote natural temperature regulation and better daytime functioning. Our bedding sheets & pillowcases are certified OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100, tested for harmful substances to protect your health.

OUR COMMITMENT: We prioritize comfort, community, and sustainability. Since 2022, we've donated over 36,000 bedding items to US charities and removed plastic from our packaging. Sheets are crafted in our family‑owned factory in India with care and quality‑checked—thread count may vary by ±5% due to standard manufacturing limits. Enjoy affordable luxury and hassle‑free returns for a better night’s sleep.

customers_say: Customers find these sheets wonderfully soft, with a bright white color and great cotton sateen material. They are comfortable, fit deep mattresses, and offer good value for money. While some customers report they are almost wrinkle-free, others mention they definitely wrinkle.

top_reviews.review_title: Great Sheets at a Great Price!
top_reviews.review_comment: These sheets appear to be well made. Very smooth and comfortable like sheets I purchased at a much higher price. Don't know how long they will last because I have only washed them once, but they seem very nice.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Finally, sheets that don't trap my body heat when I sleep! I am a hot sleeper and all the cooling sheets I have bought just don't work. These 100% cotton sheets do not trap my heat, so I can sleep comfortably. Sheets are soft, but i could have gone with a higher thread count for more softness. Washes well. Color is super cute. Sheets stray in place even when I'm tossing and turning. Thickness and weight are good for not being too hot at night.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Soft breathable great quality sheets that actually fit
top_reviews.review_comment: These sheets are soft and comfortable, being 100% they are wrinkly, but it's a fair trade off for breathable, good quality sheets. They fit my king size bed perfectly even with a 2" mattress topper and a 13" mattress.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Very soft and good quality for a reasonable price!
top_reviews.review_comment: These sheets have a very nice sheen, a pretty color, and feel soft. They washed well however, they were a bit more wrinkled than I'd hope coming out of the dryer. Not bad, but using on a guest bed so will probably iron the pillowcases so they look fresh. I ordered the full size sheet set in a striped blue and they are great with less wrinkling so not sure if there is a difference between the solid colors and patterned fabrics. I like the tags on the bottom fitted sheet that indicate the "head/foot" side when making up the bed.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: I love these sheets. They're a thicker cotton, that's softened with washing, yet still has a crisp cotton feel...like old fashioned sheets. There's been no tearing or pin holes after several washes (as I've had with BedSure brand). They are breathable, and seasonably versatile. They stayed cool in summer, yet provide a layer of warmth on cooler fall nights. The fitted sheet depth is just right on my 12" thick, queen mattress, with a thick pad. I'd prefer a bit longer flat sheet, as I prefer my sheets securely tucked in. Regardless, these are a very good price, great sheets, and I'll purchase again.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: I LOVE these sheets! I did A LOT of research before purchasing these sheets as I was recently diagnosed with a dust mite allergy! I LOVE that they are 100% long staple cotton plus the soft 400 thread count makes these sheets a perfect fit for a dust mite allergy! It took a while before I settled on these, but it was well worth the research time! I love the sage color, too! I washed these sheets in hot water first before putting them on our new bed (yep, had to get a new hypoallergenic mattress due to my dust mite allergy) and there was some "shedding". I was concerned about the shedding at first, but after some research I discovered it's a natural tendency of 100% organic cotton to shed for the first few washings, after which shedding is minimal or non-existent! After sleeping on these sheets for a week, I washed them again (in hot water) and this time there was no shedding! I dried the sheets on permanent press and put them right back on the bed. I'm very happy with these sheets, they are very well made and very comfortable to sleep on! Better than any other sheets I've had before!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Bought these for my daughter, and she absolutely loves them. They’re smooth and crisp right out of the wash, with that fresh hotel-sheet feel that somehow makes bedtime better. The color is a pretty pink, the fit is perfect with deep pockets that actually stay put, and best of all — they don’t pill from wear and tear. Great quality at a great price. She’s happy, I’m happy, and now I’m tempted to order a set for myself.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Ultra comfortable sheets, found stain after I unpacked and washed them.
top_reviews.review_comment: I received these 2 sets of white sheets for Twin XL today. I love the quality and feel. I would consider buying again as the quality of the cotton is very authentic. Real cotton does wrinkle, but it’s a trade off for a natural feel. Removed one star because the sheets came with a strange factory sent and after I washed and tumbled them I noticed a stain. I hope it goes away with some “Shout “ on the next wash cycle.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2025

top_reviews_global.review_comment: EXCELENTE PRODUCTO, SÚPER CÓMODAS Y FRESCAS
EL producto, despues de seguir las instrucciones de lavado, es realmente suave, se nota la calidad del material.
Excelente calidad-precio ¡¡ el color esta lindo, son suaves, yo pedi el tamaño queen y le quedaron perfectas, volveria a pedir esta marca...

Habia visto muchas reviews donde comentaban que eran muy asperas o que tenian problemas de calidad pero hasta el momento no he visto ninguno de esos 2 problemas, las que tengo son color negro y se ven muy bien, lo unico malo es que las individuales solo traen una funda para almohada
